page.title: 06SHOPS IN NASSINGTON.a.
page.content: There are 6 shops in Nassington.The bottom shop is{Nassington Stores}.It sells groceries,fruit,vegetables,wines spirits,beers,soft drinks,hardware, frozen food,cooked meat,ice-cream and clothing.Opening times:9am-6pm all week except Saturday 9am-5pm and Sunday 10.30-1pm.{The Post Office}is also the newsagents and sells groceries,sweets ice-cream,wool,tobacco,cards,toys,fizzy drinks & light bulbs.It opens every day from 6.am to 6.pm.On Tuesday,Saturday & Sunday it closes at 1pm.It opens at 10am on Sunday.The{Butcher}has his own abbatoir and sells all sorts of meat. He is the best butcher for many miles. Most of the animals for slaughter come from Stamford.Monday is market day at Stamford and slaughtering day.It is horrible to hear the animals noises.The shop is closed on Monday but opens each weekday from-cont.p7
